# SOME_PACKAGE

`SOME_PACKAGE` is an R package that ____

## How to install

You can install SOME_PACKAGE from CRAN.
```
install.packages("SOME_PACKAGE")
```

If you want the development version (not advised) you can install using the `remotes` package to install from GitHub.
```
if (!("remotes" %in% installed.packages())) {
  install.packages("remotes")
}
remotes::install_github("synthesizebio/SOME_PACKAGE")
```

```
library(SOME_PACKAGE)
```
